languages.text: "Иеронимус лгал тебе. Это он обрек тебя на мучения в криосклепе. Он превратил тебя в своего цепного палача".
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
languages.original_text: "Иеронимус лгал тебе. Это он обрек тебя на мучения в криосклепе. Он превратил тебя в своего цепного палача".

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."
"Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯骗了你。当初就是他让你在冷冻舱里受尽折磨，是他把你变成了他的刽子手。”
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯骗了你。当初就是他让你在冷冻舱里受尽折磨，是他把你变成了他的刽子手。”

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムスはお前に嘘を付いていた。お前を凍保管庫で何年も拷問するよう宣告したのはあいつだ。お前を忠実な死刑執行人に仕立てたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムスはお前に嘘を付いていた。お前を凍保管庫で何年も拷問するよう宣告したのはあいつだ。お前を忠実な死刑執行人に仕立てたんだ」

languages.text: «Hieronymus le mintió. Fue él quien la condenó a años de tortura en una criocámara. La convirtió en su fiel verdugo personal».
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: «Hieronymus le mintió. Fue él quien la condenó a años de tortura en una criocámara. La convirtió en su fiel verdugo personal».

languages.text: "Hieronymus hat Euch angelogen. Er hat Euch zu der jahrelangen Qual im Cryo-Grab verdammt. Er hat Euch zu seiner treuen persönlichen Scharfrichterin gemacht."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus hat Euch angelogen. Er hat Euch zu der jahrelangen Qual im Cryo-Grab verdammt. Er hat Euch zu seiner treuen persönlichen Scharfrichterin gemacht."

languages.text: « Hiéronymus vous a menti. C'est lui qui vous a condamnée à des années de torture dans une chambre cryogénique pour faire de vous son petit bourreau personnel. »
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: « Hiéronymus vous a menti. C'est lui qui vous a condamnée à des années de torture dans une chambre cryogénique pour faire de vous son petit bourreau personnel. »

languages.text: "Hieronymus sana yalan söyledi. Seni bir kriyomahzende yıllarca işkenceye maruz bırakan oydu. Seni kendisine sadık, kişisel celladına dönüştürdü."
languages.original_text: "Hieronymus lied to you. It was he who condemned you to years of torture in a cryo-vault. He turned you into his loyal personal executioner."

traits.locale_text: "Hieronymus sana yalan söyledi. Seni bir kriyomahzende yıllarca işkenceye maruz bırakan oydu. Seni, kendisine sadık, kişisel bir cellada dönüştürdü."
